{% extends "templates/item_page.html" %} {% set namespaces = "cmoon" %} {% set library_name = "Type Traits" %} {% set item_name = "copy_extent" %} {% block nested %}../{% endblock %} {% block content2 %} {{macros.defined("cmoon.type_traits", github_url_src + "/type_traits/type_traits.ixx")}} {{macros.overload_set([ " template struct copy_extent; " ])}}

Copies the array extent from type From to type To.

If std::rank_v<From> <= 0 or std::extent_v<From> <= 0, extent is not copied.

{{macros.helper_variable_template( " template using copy_extent_t = typename copy_extent::type; " )}} {% endblock %}
